page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The two{farmers}are the{main employers between them they have 10 full time agricultural workers. The basic wage for a worker is from Â£89.70 to Â£121.10 for a 40 Hr week. Only one farmworker lives locally in a{tied cottage}the others come from within an 8 mile radius. Extra workers are taken on for harvest and lambing.The farmers wife is employed as farm secretary. An agricultural chemical spray firm is run from the owners home at Braceby, two more Directors live out of the area. They employ a female secretary and a delivery man from neighbouring villages; 7 homes employ a part-time cleaner. Of the rest, some villagers work in{Grantham}(7) or local larger villages.
